verifyPanel.description: This wizard is designed to avoid missing prerequisites: it links to official sources or stable search pages and gives you a minimal verification loop.

verify.0: Pick a topic and confirm the checklist renders and checkboxes persist after refresh.
verify.1: Open at least one link from “Trusted links” and confirm it opens via openExternal/window.open.
verify.2: Use “Send to Chat” and confirm the checklist is copied and prefilled in Chat.

firstTestLoop.0: Start with “xEdit / FO4Edit” and get one clean launch first.
firstTestLoop.1: Configure your mod manager choice, then complete only the minimal “verify” steps before expanding.

troubleshooting.0: If links do not open, check Diagnostics and confirm openExternal is available (desktop app) or allow popups.
troubleshooting.1: If checkbox state does not persist, verify localStorage is available (see Diagnostics).
